name: TheKEXPArchive
0:
”Alexa, play the KEXP Archive”
”Alexa, tell the KEXP Archive to play the Morning Show”
”Alexa, ask the KEXP Archive what's playing”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the k. e. x. p. archive
Developer Terms of Use
des:
KEXP radio brings you real variety, real community and real human DJs playing the best new music along with the music you know and love. All musical eras, genres, and styles, with exclusive live performances throughout every week.
This skill is targeted at playing our two week streaming archive as well as additional on demand content as we add it. Use the skill to:
 
Play a show from the two week streaming archive
 "Alexa, ask The KEXP Archive to play the Morning Show"
 "Alexa, tell The KEXP Archive to play Street Sounds from last week Friday"
 "Alexa, ask The KEXP Archive to play Pacific Notions from two days ago" 
 
Play shows by Genre 
 "Alexa, ask The KEXP Archive to play Hip Hop" 
 "Alexa, tell The KEXP Archive to play Country" 
 
Play shows by DJ 
 "Alexa, ask The KEXP Archive to play Cheryl Waters" 
 "Alexa, tell The KEXP Archive to play Riz from last week" 
 
Skip to the top of the hour or the next show
 "Alexa, next" 
 "Alexa, tell The KEXP Archive to skip to the next show" 
 
Find out what is playing 
 "Alexa, ask The KEXP Archive what song is playing"
 "Alexa, ask The KEXP Archive to display the playlist"
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
